data.title: A Hard Day's Night in Colour
data.meta_description: A HARD DAY'S NIGHT.(1964)NOW IN COLOURStarringThe Beatles, John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, Ringo Starr,with Wilfrid Bramwell, Norman Rossington, Victor Spinetti and John Junkin.Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather (Wilfrid Bramwell) in check while preparing for a live TV performance.Originally filmed in black and White we have colorized it.Supplied on a region free DVD in a cardboard sleeve.All pictures displayed are actual screen shots taken from the movie.Watch this movie TODAY a digital download is also available.
